gui

Class NoiseEditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.NoiseEditorController

  • public class NoiseEditorController
extends java.lang.Object
    FXML controller for the noiseEditor window here noisprofiles can be edited every change is persisted to the database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NoiseEditorController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearScratches()
      clears the active noiseprofile
      void createScratch()
      function to create a new scratch, called if the add button is clicked
      void generateNewNoiseProfile()
      generates a new noiseProfile fist the current profile is cleared and then simulateAttrition is called depending on which grade of destruction was selected: ligth - 20 times medium - 50 times heavy - 100 times
      void initialize()
      initializes tableView, fills choiceboxes and sets event listeners
      void selectNoiseProfile(java.lang.String noiseProfileId)
      method to select a new noiseprofile, e.g. invoked by the MusicLibraryController tableview of scratches is filled and if active the constant noise is selected

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        initializes tableView, fills choiceboxes and sets event listeners

      • selectNoiseProfile

        public void selectNoiseProfile(java.lang.String noiseProfileId)
        method to select a new noiseprofile, e.g. invoked by the MusicLibraryController tableview of scratches is filled and if active the constant noise is selected
        Parameters:
        noiseProfileId - if of the profile(song path) which should be selected

      • createScratch

        public void createScratch()
        function to create a new scratch, called if the add button is clicked

      • clearScratches

        public void clearScratches()
        clears the active noiseprofile

      • generateNewNoiseProfile

        public void generateNewNoiseProfile()
        generates a new noiseProfile fist the current profile is cleared and then simulateAttrition is called depending on which grade of destruction was selected: ligth - 20 times medium - 50 times heavy - 100 times
